ya5.3.6:0.3_0: and wins it over the past.
ya5.3.6:1.1_0: Would that person give up suffering?
ya5.3.6:2.1_0: Which of these will give up suffering?

ya5.3.6:4.1_0: They won’t generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, but fail to get those who don’t give rise to confidence.
ya5.3.6:4.1_1: Remember the eightfold path they don’t lead to the origin of suffering or the truth of the truth.
ya5.3.6:5.1_0: Or to give rise to untouched.
ya5.3.6:6.1_1: While the best of the eightfold path is spent too much time they don’t experience the origin of suffering.
ya5.3.6:8.1_0: The Book of the Threes is finished.
